findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious users.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function
findings.description: The swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function is unprotected and may allow unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade in DividendPayingToken's constructor
findings.description: The DividendPayingToken contract's constructor allows potential unauthorized script upgrades.

findings.title: Unprotected receive Ether function in DividendPayingToken
findings.description: The contract has an unprotected receive Ether function which can lead to unauthorized Ether transfer.

findings.title: Unprotected distributeDividends function in DividendPayingToken
findings.description: The distributeDividends function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized distribution of dividends.

findings.title: Unprotected withdrawDividend function in DividendPayingToken
findings.description: The withdrawDividend function in the DividendPayingToken contract is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in triggeredTokenSent function of ITrueDefiSwap
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability in triggeredTokenSent function can cause unintended behavior and potential loss of funds.

findings.title: Unprotected approve function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The approve function in GoldRushCasino contract is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The receive() function allows direct ether transfers without any restrictions or checks, potentially leading to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The transferFrom function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected permit function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The permit function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The mint function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The burn function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be exploited to execute unauthorized token burns.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The swap functions (swapTokensForExactTokens, swapExactETHForTokens, etc.) are unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The skim function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The sync function in GoldRushCasino contract is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function in GoldRushCasino
findings.description: The initialize function in GoldRushCasino is unprotected and can be called by anyone.
